setPermissions(address[],bool[]).details: Grants or revokes execution permissions for a given array of callers on this account. Can only be called by the root owner of the account

params._permissions: Array of booleans, true if execution permissions should be granted, false if permissions should be revoked
params.callers: Array of callers to grant permissions to
